titleStmt.title: Some reflections upon the author and licenser of a scandalous pamphlet called The missioners arts discover'd with the reply of A. Pullton to a challenge made him in a letter, prefix'd to the said pamphlet.
titleStmt.author: Pulton, A. (Andrew), 1654-1710.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Mary Thompson for the author, and are to be sold by Matthew Turner ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Andrew Pulton. Cf. BM.
"The missionarie's arts discovered" is by William Wake. Cf. BM.
